snippet.title: Metroid Prime Remastered — Overview Trailer — Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Take on the role of Samus Aran and make use of visors, weapons, and other abilities to overcome the nefarious Space Pirates and uncover the mysteries on Tallon IV. Both digital and physical versions of Metroid Prime Remastered are available now, only on Nintendo Switch.

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
